name: Curse of Curseville
description:
Welcome to Curse of Curseville. A game where you must fight for your life as you fend off hordes of evil zombies. See how long you can survive

Goal: 
  • Kill all zombies to complete a wave.
  • Survive as many waves as possible.
How to play:                            
  • Movement: WASD                           
  • Fire pistol: LMB

Note: Actual work time was one session of 12 hours. Because of this, the game may not be as polished as we would like. However, we are still proud of what we accomplished and would like to share with you. Apologies in advance any issues. Feel free to post your thoughts in the comments.

Thank you for checking out Curse of Curseville.
We hope you enjoy.

Submission for Kenney Jam 2020

===========================================================

Dev team:
